long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ğ¡ollect verified emails of decision makers right from their professional social profiles with LI Prospect Finder extension.

Set it up in one click and you are good to go â€“ ready to get the email addresses of the most high-paying prospects.

Where can you collect leads with LI Prospect Finder?
Save email addresses from profiles, search pages and attendee lists on professional social networks.

How can you save leads to your sales pipeline?
When you see a contact youâ€™d like to get, open the LI Prospect Finder plugin in your browser and save the email address and other profile information straight into a chosen list. 

What do you get with LI Prospect Finder?
âœ“ Spare countless hours by saving full prospect information from profile, search pages and attendee lists one-by-one or in bulk.

âœ“ Build lead databases with verified and up-to-date email addresses.

âœ“ Manage leads in a built-in sales CRM or export the leads to your favorite CRMs, like Hubspot or Pipedrive, in a heartbeat.


Before using our LI Prospect Finder, be sure to read and agree to Privacy Policy https://li-prospect-finder.com/privacy-policy

LI Prospect Finder permissions
1."tabs" â€” is using the chrome.tabs API (getting bookmark links, creating new tabs with our link, reloading open pages of li-prospect-finder.com)
2."http://*/" â€” access to all sites to get page content (alternative to all_urls)
3."https://*/" â€” access to all sites to get page content (alternative to all_urls)
4."cookies" â€” session recovery via cookies from li-prospect-finder.com
5."notifications" â€” to show push notifications (completion of background tasks)
6."webRequest" â€” for automated information collection from web pages without direct opening of the pages by the user
7."contextMenus" â€” to create a new item 'Background tasks' in the context menu of the extension

Sign up right now for a free plan and get 50 credits every month!
